class.name: NgFilter
class.preview: Use @angular-core-annotation.NgFilter annotation to register a new filter. A filter is a class with a call method (a callable function).

class.name: NgDetachAware
class.preview: Implementing directives or components angular-core-annotation.NgDetachAware.detach method will be called when the associated scope is destroyed.

class.name: NgAttachAware
class.preview: Implementing directives or components angular-core-annotation.NgAttachAware.attach method will be called when the next scope digest occurs after component instantiation. It is guaranteed that when angular-core-annotation.NgAttachAware.attach is invoked, that all attribute mappings have already been processed.

class.name: NgCallback
class.preview: When applied as an annotation on a directive field specifies that the field is to be mapped to DOM attribute with the provided angular-core-annotation.AttrFieldAnnotation.attrName. The value of the attribute to be treated as a callback expression, equivalent to & specification.

class.name: NgTwoWay
class.preview: When applied as an annotation on a directive field specifies that the field is to be mapped to DOM attribute with the provided angular-core-annotation.AttrFieldAnnotation.attrName. The value of the attribute to be treated as a two-way expression, equivalent to <=> specification.

class.name: NgOneWayOneTime
class.preview: When applied as an annotation on a directive field specifies that the field is to be mapped to DOM attribute with the provided angular-core-annotation.AttrFieldAnnotation.attrName. The value of the attribute to be treated as a one time one-way expression, equivalent to =>! specification.

class.name: NgOneWay
class.preview: When applied as an annotation on a directive field specifies that the field is to be mapped to DOM attribute with the provided angular-core-annotation.AttrFieldAnnotation.attrName. The value of the attribute to be treated as a one-way expression, equivalent to => specification.

class.name: NgAttr
class.preview: When applied as an annotation on a directive field specifies that the field is to be mapped to DOM attribute with the provided angular-core-annotation.AttrFieldAnnotation.attrName. The value of the attribute to be treated as a string, equivalent to @ specification.

class.name: NgController
class.preview: Meta-data marker placed on a class which should act as a controller for your application.

class.name: NgDirective
class.preview: Meta-data marker placed on a class which should act as a directive.

class.name: NgComponent
class.preview: Meta-data marker placed on a class which should act as a controller for the component. Angular components are a light-weight version of web-components. Angular components use shadow-DOM for rendering their templates.

class.name: NgInjectableService
class.preview: An annotation when applied to a class indicates that the class (service) will be instantiated by di injector.
